function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants perceiving a low risk of COVID-19 infection (≤20%)","Impact":"Increased likelihood of underestimating the threat and taking insufficient precautions","Mitigation":"Provide targeted education and information on the risks of COVID-19 infection to increase awareness","Technologies":"Health communication, public health campaigns","People":"Participants with low perceived risk","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Potential rebounding effects of higher emissions post-pandemic lockdowns","Impact":"Contribution to worsening climate change and environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Implement policies to encourage sustainable practices and reduce carbon emissions","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, carbon capture and storage","People":"Global population, environmental organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, international environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Deprioritization of climate-related issues in global agendas due to the health crisis","Impact":"Delay in addressing climate change and its impacts, leading to long-term environmental and societal consequences","Mitigation":"Advocate for the integration of climate change considerations in post-pandemic recovery plans and policies","Technologies":"Climate change modeling, sustainable development technologies","People":"Global population, climate activists","Owner":"International organizations, policymakers"}]}
